thread.title: Great location and great service
thread.title_full: Great location and great service - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jasonsmithjr
title: Great location and great service
text: We called a few days before our arrival and asked for a good view. Coincidentally the gentleman we spoke over the phone was the same person that checked us in. Diesel did an exceptional job checking us in and also had the great room with a view ready for us. The studio suite was spacious and very clean. We would highly recommend this hotel to any family visiting NYC. It's within walking distance to almost everything. I will definitely stay here again and call Diesel to get a great room with a view.
